item.description:
Join me and a few of my friends from the Worcester Karaoke Group for a night of fun!
We're going to catch the 3:55 showing of The Bucket List.
Make sure to be there at 3:30 so we can decide where we want to have dinner and I'll run over before the movie and reserve a table for 6:00 before the movie starts.
After the movie we'll be grabbing dinner at one of the many places to eat at:

The Blackstone Valley 14 Cinema
The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley
70 Worcester/Providence Turnpike
Millbury, MA 01527
(508) 865-7168

Located right off Rt. 146. (next exit after the Rt. 20, Mass Pike exit) Heading away from Worcester in Millbury.
Make sure to park on the Mall side NOT the cinema side. I'll be at the rear entrance.
Any questions call me at (508) 212-4111.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the rear entrance (Mall Side) Wearing a green coat
item.name: MOVIE NIGHT! The Bucket List and dinner after the movie
